filter-channel.description: The channel to filter autocomplete results with

message.description: Add a button to this message. A message link is also accepted here

channel.description: The channel that the message is in, for autocomplete results

triggers.description: Set up triggers to respond to events in your server

event.description: The event that will set off the trigger

channel.description: The channel to create the webhook in

show-url.description: Only enable this if you need the URL for an external application
Whether to skip the "Get URL" step. This makes the message hidden

welcomer.description: Welcomer functionality has been moved to /triggers!

tag.description: The tag to get help for

message.description: The message to create the reaction on. A message link is also accepted here

emoji.description: The emoji that the reaction should show. For external emojis, react before the bot

role.description: The role that should be assigned/removed when the reaction is clicked

channel.description: The channel that the message is in, for autocomplete results

delete.description: Delete a reaction role from a message

message.description: The message to delete the reaction role from. A message link is also accepted here

emoji.description: The emoji that the reaction shows. Omit this parameter to view a deletion menu

channel.description: The channel that the message is in, for autocomplete results

mention.description: Outputs the mention format for a user or role

target.description: The user or role to mention

channel.description: Outputs the mention format for a channel

emoji.description: Outputs the usage format for a server emoji

id.name: id
id.description: Get the numeric ID of a Discord resource

mention.description: Outputs the ID for a user or role

channel.description: Outputs the ID for a channel or thread

emoji.description: Outputs the ID for a server emoji

noMigratableComponents: This message has no registered, migratable components.
noComponentFlow: There was no flow registered for this component. Configure one [here]({{url}}).
welcomerCommandDeprecated: In order to set up a welcomer, please use the **/triggers** command.
noTrigger: This server has no trigger with that name.
triggerDuplicate: This server already has a trigger for that event.
